name: Mahlnor
content:
Mahlnor, also nicknamed Mal, was a Twi'lek individual acquainted with Gial Ackbar.
Mahlnor was first seen in the trailer for LEGO Star Wars Summer Vacation, which came out on June 21, 2022. Though not stated in the trailer itself, her nickname Mal was revealed in the closed captioning for the Twitter release of the trailer. Her full name of Mahlnor was revealed in LEGO Star Wars Summer Vacation.
